boat.name: Fargo II
boat.full_description:
Fargo II was the second boat of this name built for Dr G.G.Wells, hence the name (Wells Fargo...) She moved from the East to the South coast, and back. Her current owner bought her in 1988 in Chichester. He cruised her to the near Continent and did a circumnavigation of the British Isles in 1994\.

Fargo II spent the 1999-2000 season in South Brittany, with a home port of Brest before returning to the UK to cruise the East Coast.

She has been out of commission since 2009, but the owner hopes to relaunch her in 2021 s she is a fabulous cruising boat.
boat.short_description: Fargo II is a Salar 40 class Bermudan yacht
